title: Ep. 1047 - Trump's Huge Announcement
description:
A new report shows that most of Biden’s top officials have zero years of business experience, Trump makes a decision about 2024, and a major new development comes out in the politically charged rape case of a 10-year-old girl.

Become a DailyWire+ member today to watch Matt Walsh’s documentary “What Is A Woman?”, Jordan Peterson’s new series “Dragons, Monsters, and Men” and access the entire DailyWire+ content catalog: https://utm.io/ueIZt
